name: Agency
headline: Solving Complex Security and Compliance
description:
Agency specializes in multi-party security and compliance scenarios; we are the Palantir of compliance. We serve the most innovative companies and their teams working on critical challenges and transformative technologies by helping them achieve standards like SOC2, ISO 27001, CMMC, NIST, HIPAA, and GDPR that meet the highest levels of scrutiny from third parties.

Our patented platform, Verse, integrates with GRC software like Vanta, cloud infrastructure, and your endpoints to securely handle complex multi-layered configurations, such as remote contractor use, BYODs, and federated client-hosted application deployments. 

Our managed security and compliance team helps high-growth software companies meet rigorous standards as quickly as possible by doing it for them. 

Our ETDR program enables organizations to prevent threats directly targeting their employees' personal devices, data, and online accounts while respecting their privacy. We provide customized solutions to prevent insider threats, data loss prevention, and threat intelligence while safeguarding personal privacy.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:compliance; industry:security; industry:enterprise; location:new-york

founders.name: Amir Tarighat, Founder
founders.description: Amir Tarighat is the cofounder and CEO of Agency. He's a developer, cybersecurity expert, and digital privacy advocate. Amir graduated from Harvard University, and studied Advanced Computer Security at Stanford. He lives in NYC.

founders.name: Tyler Carbone, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder at Agency, where we provide personal cybersecurity + coverage. Previous founder Terbium Labs (sold to Deloitte), Evenspring (sold to Timmons Group) and SRRN Games.

## Confidential, Compliant, & Fully Customizable 
Complex security problems require more than off the shelf software. Agency solves multiparty security problems using a combination of propriety technologies, integrations with the leading software providers, and forward-deployed security engineering. 
[Request a Demo](https://GetAgency.com/</request-demo>)

## Orchestrate & Deploy Solutions Across Your Organization
Capabilities tailored to your unique needs.
[Request a Demo](https://GetAgency.com/</request-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992702a_Group%2015.svg)
### Insurance
Implement, monitor, and maintain the required security controls for cyber insurance while providing comprehensive documentation that helps secure favorable coverage terms. 
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/insurance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927028_Group%2021.svg)
### Governance Risk and Compliance
Establish and maintain a robust framework for managing risk, ensuring compliance with industry regulations, and implementing policies to mitigate security threats. 
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/governance-risk-and-compliance>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927027_Group%2012.svg)
### Social Media Monitoring
Continuously monitor social media platforms for potential threats, brand reputation risks, and data leaks, ensuring early detection of any cyber incidents related to online presence. 
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/social-media-monitoring>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992702b_user-minus.svg)
### Personal Information Removal
Identify and remove sensitive personal information from online platforms, databases, and public records to minimize the risk of identity theft, data breaches, and privacy violations. 
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/personal-information-removal>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927026_globe.svg)
### Network
Design and secure resilient network infrastructures that protect against unauthorized access and ensure secure communication between systems and users. 
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/network>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927025_eye.svg)
### EDR
Deploy endpoint detection and response solutions to monitor and respond to suspicious activities across endpoints– providing real-time protection against malware, ransomware, and other evolving threats.
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/edr>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992702b_user-minus.svg)
### DLP
Implement data loss prevention policies to safeguard sensitive data from unauthorized access, leakage, and loss– ensuring that critical information remains protected across different endpoints, networks, and cloud environments.
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/dlp>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992703f_b75708d097f2188dff6617b0f00f7c43.svg)
### Android Security
Protect Android devices with robust security protocols, including app monitoring, device encryption, and threat detection, to protect against vulnerabilities and maintain user privacy.
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/android-security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927040_Vector.svg)
### iOS Security
Our iOS Security solutions protect against unauthorized access, malicious apps, and data breaches on Apple devices.
[Learn more](https://GetAgency.com/</capabilities/ios-security>)
## Learn How Leading Organizations Work With Agency
Our client base spans across a wide array of industries. Discover how our services have helped our customers protect their businesses. 
[Impact Studies](https://GetAgency.com/</impact-studies>)
![image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/676da00b5f14218f09926fea_impact-1.png)
### How SaaS Company Stoped an Insider Threat
Agency received intel suggesting that one of our clients was the victim of an employment identity fraud scam with potential ties to the government of North Korea. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/67ae7191acbdbe88082911f0_676da00b5f14218f09927044_Rectangle%2019.png)
### 2023 Not (Cyber) Safe for Work Report
Agency's nationwide survey of executives using personal devices for work and how it impacts company security.
## Industry Leading Security & Compliance
We strive to meet the highest standards of security and privacy. Our mature compliance posture has met the highest levels of scrutiny from independent third party auditors.
![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/676da00b5f14218f09926fec_sert1.svg)![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/676da00b5f14218f09926feb_sert2.svg)![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/676da00b5f14218f09926fee_sert3.svg)![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/676da00b5f14218f09926fef_sert4.svg)![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/676da00b5f14218f09926fed_sert5.svg)![icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/676da00b5f14218f09926fec_sert1.svg)
## Custom Security To Protect Your Most Critical Threat Surface
Fully customized and integrated solutions with 24/7 monitoring and response from our US based forward-deployed team.
[Request a Demo](https://GetAgency.com/</request-demo>)

Our mission is to solve security challenges for the worlds most innovative companies working on the critical challenges and transformative technologies of our day, all helping them maintain the highest standards of ISO 27001, CMMC, NIST, GDPR, HIPAA.
Go to Challenges⟨58⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/67acfab07df34e5b30f89847_Illus_Mesa%20de%20trabajo%201%20copia%209.png)

## Executive Cybersecurity
Executive Cybersecurity⟨3⟩
## Orchestrate & Deploy Solutions Across Your Organization
Capabilities tailored to your unique needs.
Request a Demo⟨31⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992702a_Group%2015.svg)
### Insurance
Implement, monitor, and maintain the required security controls for cyber insurance while providing comprehensive documentation that helps secure favorable coverage terms. 
Learn more⟨61⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927028_Group%2021.svg)
### Governance Risk and Compliance
Establish and maintain a robust framework for managing risk, ensuring compliance with industry regulations, and implementing policies to mitigate security threats. 
Learn more⟨62⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927027_Group%2012.svg)
### Social Media Monitoring
Continuously monitor social media platforms for potential threats, brand reputation risks, and data leaks, ensuring early detection of any cyber incidents related to online presence. 
Learn more⟨63⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992702b_user-minus.svg)
### Personal Information Removal
Identify and remove sensitive personal information from online platforms, databases, and public records to minimize the risk of identity theft, data breaches, and privacy violations. 
Learn more⟨64⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927026_globe.svg)
### Network
Design and secure resilient network infrastructures that protect against unauthorized access and ensure secure communication between systems and users. 
Learn more⟨65⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927025_eye.svg)
### EDR
Deploy endpoint detection and response solutions to monitor and respond to suspicious activities across endpoints– providing real-time protection against malware, ransomware, and other evolving threats.
Learn more⟨66⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992702b_user-minus.svg)
### DLP
Implement data loss prevention policies to safeguard sensitive data from unauthorized access, leakage, and loss– ensuring that critical information remains protected across different endpoints, networks, and cloud environments.
Learn more⟨67⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f0992703f_b75708d097f2188dff6617b0f00f7c43.svg)
### Android Security
Protect Android devices with robust security protocols, including app monitoring, device encryption, and threat detection, to protect against vulnerabilities and maintain user privacy.
Learn more⟨68⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09927000/676da00b5f14218f09927040_Vector.svg)
### iOS Security
Our iOS Security solutions protect against unauthorized access, malicious apps, and data breaches on Apple devices.
Learn more⟨69⟩
## Learn How Leading Organizations Work With Agency
Our client base spans across a wide array of industries. Discover how our services have helped our customers protect their businesses. 
Impact Studies⟨70⟩
![image⟨71⟩]
### How SaaS Company Stoped an Insider Threat
Agency received intel suggesting that one of our clients was the victim of an employment identity fraud scam with potential ties to the government of North Korea. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/676da00b5f14218f09926fc2/67ae7191acbdbe88082911f0_676da00b5f14218f09927044_Rectangle%2019.png)
### 2023 Not (Cyber) Safe for Work Report
Agency's nationwide survey of executives using personal devices for work and how it impacts company security.
## Industry Leading Security & Compliance
We strive to meet the highest standards of security and privacy. Our mature compliance posture has met the highest levels of scrutiny from independent third party auditors.
![icon⟨72⟩]![icon⟨73⟩]![icon⟨74⟩]![icon⟨75⟩]![icon⟨76⟩]![icon⟨72⟩]
## Custom Security To Protect Your Most Critical Threat Surface
Fully customized and integrated solutions with 24/7 monitoring and response from our US based forward-deployed team.
Request a Demo⟨31⟩

generated_description:
**Agency: Simplifying Security and Compliance for Innovative Businesses**

**Overview**
Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Agency is transforming the way innovative companies tackle complex security and compliance challenges. Located in New York, Agency has positioned itself as the “Palantir of compliance,” primarily serving high-growth software companies. With a foundation built on providing standardized solutions like SOC2, ISO 27001, CMMC, NIST, HIPAA, and GDPR, Agency operates at the intersection of technology, privacy, and regulatory demand.

**Mission**
Agency is on a mission to solve intricate security and compliance issues for the world's most innovative businesses. They aim to help their customers achieve compliance while reducing friction, especially when facing the scrutiny of third-party audits.

**Key Product: Verse**
At the heart of Agency's offering is Verse, a patented platform that integrates seamlessly with Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) software like Vanta, cloud infrastructures, and endpoints. This allows businesses to manage complicated configurations such as remote contractor setups and Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) policies. This tailored approach eliminates much of the guesswork and manual effort that often bogs down compliance efforts.

**Services Offered**
Agency excels in managed security and compliance solutions. Their offerings span a range of capabilities, addressing:
- **BYOD Security**
- **Executive Cybersecurity**
- **Insider Threats**
- **Remote Work Security**
- **Social Media Threats**

Additionally, Agency is equipped to support a wide variety of industries, including:
- Aerospace & Aviation
- Critical Infrastructure
- Energy
- Financial Services
- Government
- Technology & Software

Their team works around the clock to ensure that their clients not only meet but exceed the rigorous security standards needed to protect sensitive data while preserving personal privacy.

**ETDR Program**
The Enhanced Threat Detection and Response (ETDR) program is a noteworthy feature that focuses on safeguarding employees' personal devices and online accounts. This initiative highlights Agency's commitment to respecting privacy while simultaneously enhancing security protocols tailored to detect insider threats and data loss.

**Customer Trust**
Agency has made strides in earning the trust of leading companies, boasting a client roster that spans over 200 industry leaders. This trust is not achieved overnight; it comes from delivering results-driven solutions and being a reliable partner in the complexities of digital security.

**Recognition**
With an impressive 4.9 out of 5 stars on G2, Agency is recognized not just as a solution provider but as a leader in proactive digital risk management. They are known for their high performance and ease of doing business, making them a go-to partner for organizations navigating the intricate landscape of cybersecurity and compliance.

**Conclusion**
Agency embodies the ideal of combining intelligence with a service-oriented mindset, making them a formidable player in the cybersecurity landscape. If you’re looking to navigate the complexities of modern security and compliance challenges, Agency is well-prepped to help steer your company toward achieving its highest standards. You can explore more about their offerings and request a demo at [GetAgency.com](https://GetAgency.com).
